mapper.update: update coupon_config set stock = stock + #{num}, receive_num = receive_num - #{num} where id = #{id} and stock + #{num} >= 0 and deleted = false and state = true
mapper.select: select id, title, max_limit as maxLimit, coupon_type as couponType, deduction_value as deductionValue, discount_value as discountValue, use_threshold as useThreshold, use_start_time as useStartTime, use_end_time as useEndTime, instruction from coupon_config where deleted = false and stock > 0 and state = 1 and `mode` = 1 and now() between start_time and end_time

select r.id, r.title, r.max_limit as maxLimit, r.coupon_type as couponType, r.deduction_value as deductionValue, r.discount_value as discountValue, r.use_threshold as useThreshold, r.use_start_time as useStartTime, r.use_end_time as useEndTime, r.instruction from coupon_product t inner join coupon_config r on t.coupon_config_id = r.id where r.deleted = false and stock > 0 and state = 1 and `mode` = 1 and t.product_id = #{productId}
